overview: "Pierogi - stories with stuffing" are short glances towards four different worlds. The characters of the film will let you into their lives for a moment, but they don't promise to reckon how their stories will end. In fact, you can be sure they left the endings for themselves. Stuffed stories are a search for the unusual in the ordinary. It is worth absorbing this uniqueness. Remember, the door will only be ajar for a moment.
title: Pierogi: Stories with Stuffing
